00026         if (!m_initialized)

00032 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 void BlobModel::FindBlobs(IplImage* frame, IplImage* mask) {
00034         if (!m_initialized)
00035                 return;
00036 
00037         // detect contours and populate array of blobs
00038         CvSeq* contour = 0;             
00039         cvFindContours(mask, OpenCVmemory, &contour, sizeof(CvContour), CV_RETR_CCOMP, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE);
00040         // clear the blob array
00041         blob.RemoveAll();
00042         int nPix = frame->width*frame->height;
00043         for(; contour != 0; contour = contour->h_next)
00044         {
00045                 // discard noise contours
00046                 CvMoments moments;
00047                 cvMoments(contour , &moments);
00048                 double area = cvGetCentralMoment(&moments, 0, 0); // area
00049                 if (area > doc->blobmodel.m_minArea*nPix && area < doc->blobmodel.m_maxArea*nPix) {
00050                         blob.Add(new Blob(contour, doc));
00051                 }
00052         }
00053 }
00054 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 void BlobModel::Draw(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00056         if (!m_initialized)
00057                 return;
00058 
00059         for (int i=0;i<blob.GetCount();i++) {
00060                 blob[i]->Draw(frame, color);
00061         }
00062 }

00081 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 void BlobModel::UpdateHeatMap(IplImage* motionmap) {
00083         // for each head candidate draw a circle on the floor; add it to the heatmap image
00084         // NOTE: due to scaling, circle becomes an ellipse
00085         double BLOB_RADIUS = 50; // blob projection on the floor average radius in centimeters 
00086         bool oneclose = false;
00087         for (int i=0;i<blob.GetCount();i++) {
00088                 CvSeq* heads = doc->blobmodel.blob[i]->heads;
00089                 for (int j=0;j<heads->total;j++) {
00090                         BlobRay* br = (BlobRay*)cvGetSeqElem(heads, j);
00091                         CvPoint3D32f head, foot;
00092                         doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2RealSameXY_Feet2Floor(cvPointTo32f(br->p1), cvPointTo32f(br->p2), &head, &foot);
00093                         // ignore short candidates
00094                         if (head.z < doc->bodymodel.m_minHeight)
00095                                 continue;
00096                         // ignore repeating artifact closeby candidates
00097                         if (oneclose)
00098                                 continue;
00099                         if (d(foot) < BLOB_RADIUS*2)
00100                                 oneclose = true;
00101 
00102                         CvPoint c = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(foot);
00103                         CvSize axes = doc->floormodel.sizeReal2Floor(cvSize2D32f(BLOB_RADIUS, BLOB_RADIUS)); 
00104                         cvZero(motionmaptemp);
00105                         cvEllipse(motionmaptemp, c, axes, 0, 0, 360, cvScalar(1), CV_FILLED);
00106                         cvAcc(motionmaptemp, motionmap);
00107                 }
00108         }
00109 }
